DOC.brief_summary: There evidence suggest ginseng Ginkgo biloba improve cognitive performance , however , little known mechanism associate improvement . Here , test whether cardiovascular reactivity task associate cognitive improvement .
DOC.brief_title: Ginseng Ginkgo Biloba Effects Cognition Modulated Cardiovascular Reactivity
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer range age 18 30 . Ginseng group : exclude regularly consume caffeine Panax Ginseng , diabetic , hormone sensitive condition , autoimmune disease , bleed condition , heart condition take medication know interact Panax Ginseng . These include anticoagulant , Warfarin , Ibuprofen , MAOIs , medication change liver , stimulant drug ( e.g . pseudoephedrine , epinephrine ) . Ginkgo Biloba group : exclude regularly consume caffeine Ginkgo Biloba , diabetic , experienced seizure past , bleed disorder , take medication know interact Ginkgo Biloba . These include Ibuprofen , anticoagulant , Warfarin , Buspirone , Fluoxetine , Trazodone
